title: HPSC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 50 Assistant Engineer Posts
description: The Haryana Public Service Commission (HPSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 50 Assistant Engineer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the HPSC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection pro...
